channel.title: fpm on WorkSpace
channel.description: Recent content in fpm on WorkSpace

item.title: Build 5GC-C
item.description: 1. 安装打包工具 apt-get install -y build-essential apt-get install -y ruby rubygems ruby-dev #gem sources --add https://gems.

item.title: EPC的CI/CD
item.description: 1. 流程介绍 开发人员合并代码到gogs，触发钩子，drone根据git仓库中的.drone.yml进行工作，使用fpm进行rpm打包并更新本地yum仓库 2. .drone.yml workspace: base: /root/gogs path: epc-c pipeline: build: image: centos7.
